articles.description: The sharp rally in public sector lender's shares drove its market-cap (m-cap) past the Rs 5 lakh crore mark. As of 11:50 am, it was commanding a market cap of Rs 5.03 lakh crore. The lender is placed at the seventh position in the overall m-cap ranking.

Shares of rallied close to 3 per cent to hit record high of Rs 574.7 per share on NSE in Wednesday's trade. Meanwhile, on BSE, the scrip marked a new all-time high of Rs 574.65 apiece.

articles.author: Ratna Bhushan
articles.title: Night delivery new war zone for online grocers; Instamart, Dunzo, Zepto, Blinkit all in race - Economic Times
articles.description: Reliance-backed Dunzo is also making late-night deliveries.  We are seeing a decent part of our order volumes come up late in the night as well,  said Mrunmayi Oke, head of revenue at Dunzo.

articles.title: Bajaj Finserv Stock Record-date For Split, Bonus Tomorrow, Share Price Up 4.7% - Goodreturns
